name: Stairway to kitchen
description:
Elevator speech:

Aren’t you wondering about how it is to use special ingredients for dinner? Aren't you wondering what will be with Gordon Ramsey after his death? Isn’t your dream - to cook Butter Chicken? I bet yes. In our game you can be the paradise kitchen chef and cook special dinner for special customers. But not always you can satisfy customers' wishes, because no god tells you what he exactly wants. You should figure out through dialogues what “taste” he/she wants. 

Guide: 

After the customer visits your restaurant your aim is to figure out what mood you need to add in your dinner to satisfy him. On the right side of your restaurant windows you have a product list, and list recipes, after you click the “COOK” button, your dinner appears on your table in the restaurant table. 

After that you can click on the restaurant bell, after that you give your dinner to the customer. After that, customers will mark your dinner. Have a good luck!

PS:

At this moment you can play only in tutorial level, cause the game in prototype-condition. We are planing to improve our game after game jam end.

Credits:

  • Art : Darya Kivatitskaya
  • Pixel Art : Almaz Jekezhanov
  • Unity Developer : Yuriy Yarkovich
  • Teamleader/Unity Developer : Nikita Moysenovich
